title: Go for rounded
content: Hi, I'm trying to know more "rounded" typefaces, so if you guys can give me more good examples
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content:
160 hits on "rounded" at MyFonts.com   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtext=rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtext=rounded)  
   
Cheers, Si

Mark Von Bronkhorst   
"Conduit"   
 [www.itcfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.itcfonts.com/)   
   
Dario Muhafara   
"Cineplex"   
 [www.Linotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.linotype.com/)   
   
...a few other links thay may be harder to find...   
   
Samy Halim   
"Dieselis"   
 [http://www.2rebels.com/siteen.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.2rebels.com/siteen.html)   
   
"Prologue", "Geheimagent-Trash"   
 [http://cape-arcona.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/cape-arcona.com/)   
   
Fabrizio Schiavi (Italy)   
"Sys", "Monica"   
 [www.fsd.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.fsd.it/)   
   
Erik Wors

Thank you for your recommandations!   
   
Franfurter is the kind of typeface i was searching,   
and Lineto's Typ1451 is gorgeous too.   
   
I didn't find Chrometica, can you point me to a sample?   
   
...

[http://www.letraslatinas.com/html\_tex/rondana.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.letraslatinas.com/html_tex/rondana.shtml)   
very nice but not released yet.

Hey Gregory!   
   
Here's some of what I file under the bubble/hotdog category:   
Fontalicious [Billo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/billo.html), [Marshmallow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.fontalicious.com/shopping/FONstore.cgi?user_action=detail&catalogno=fam-0006), [Plush](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/plush.html)   
Maniackers [Coppepan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/coppepan.html), [Pico](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/pico.html)   
Linotype [Chromium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224544/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdisplay&packagefontid=0&displayfontid=C.2569.0.1&view=single&searchID=0&searchby=keyword&searchletter=A&searchstr=chromium&totalrecords=5&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1)
